edu.ftdev.Maze

Class MazeCanvas.CellState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ftdev.Maze.MazeCanvas.CellState
  • Enclosing class:
    MazeCanvas

    protected class MazeCanvas.CellState
extends Object
    Extracts the internal state of a maze cell, like the sides walled-in, the sides with paths drawn over, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getShade

        public boolean getShade()
        Extracts the shade color for a given cell. If successful, field ShadeColor will contain the current shade color.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getCenter

        public boolean getCenter()

      • getWallSides

        public boolean getWallSides()
        Extracts the list of sides walled-in for a given cell. If successful, object WallSides will contain the list of sides walled-in.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getPathSides

        public boolean getPathSides()
        Extracts the list of sides with path drawn over for a given cell. If successful, object PathSides will contain the list of sides with the path drawn over.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

        public void drawDbgFrame()
